definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl

sentences.english: It will produce BOPP, polyester, metallised and other related films.
sentences.chinese: 這將會產生聚丙烯，聚酯，鋁和其他有關的電影。

sentences.english: This paper is special in dynamics performance of reticulate polypropylene fiber concrete.
sentences.chinese: 研究了聚丙烯纖維網混凝土的動力學性能。

sentences.english: Sorbitol acetals is the most one kind of the nucleating agents for polypropylene crystallization.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇縮醛是最重要的聚丙烯成核劑之一。

sentences.english: Polypropylene enclosure finished in textured midnight blue.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯箱體，午夜藍粗質外表。

sentences.english: Modification function of phosphoric acid to low temperature carbon based on polyacrylonitrile was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磷酸對聚丙烯腈基低溫碳材料的改性作用。

sentences.english: Polypropylene is used for standard clamps and Polyamide or Aluminum for special applications.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯是標準夾具和聚酰胺或特殊應用鋁的使用。

sentences.english: Injection-molded full-length polypropylene lasting board delivers maximum rigidity and support.
sentences.chinese: 注射成型全長聚丙烯持久板提供了最大的剛性和支持。

sentences.english: The products are made of metallized polypropylene film, seal with epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 金屬化聚丙烯膜卷繞而成，阻燃環氧樹脂封封。

sentences.english: Reliable estimation of melt index(MI) is crucial for the production of polypropylene.
sentences.chinese: 可靠地預報熔融指數在聚丙烯生產過程中至關重要。

sentences.english: The main technical measures for increasing the capacity of polypropylene plant were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了聚丙烯裝置擴能改造的主要技術措施。

sentences.english: A composition for preparing tarpaulin is studied by using a tactic polypropylene and natural rubber.
sentences.chinese: 研究了無規聚丙烯與天然橡膠並用製備篷布的配方。

sentences.english: The purpose of this study is to simulate the propylene polymerization process based on multi-zone circulation reactor (MZCR).
sentences.chinese: 本論文還對聚丙烯多段氫調改性進行了初步研究。

sentences.english: The process of microaldehyde deodorization for the PP transparent nucleating agent were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脫除聚丙烯透明成核劑中微量芳醛的方法。

sentences.english: Cooling paste based on polyacrylate hydrogel was fabricated via radical polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 製備了以聚丙烯酸鈉爲基材的高分子水凝膠退熱貼。

sentences.english: The occurrence of nanocomposites brings the modification of PP the new methods.
sentences.chinese: 納米複合材料的出現爲聚丙烯的改性提供了新的方法。

sentences.english: The PAN-based carbon fiber precursor was prepared with gel spinning method.
sentences.chinese: 利用凝膠紡絲方法制備了聚丙烯腈基碳纖維原絲。
